TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension extends System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension

summary.span: 为 XML 架构元素声明（包括 WSDL 文档中的文本 XSD 消息部分）生成到 .NET Framework 类型的内部映射。

span.span: Generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations, including literal XSD message parts in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 进行了扩展类型化数据集提供其他功能。Expands upon the to provide additional functionality for typed datasets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 进行了扩展以提供其他功能的类型化数据集和生成的 XML 架构元素声明，包括 WSDL 文档中的文本 XSD 消息部分的.NET Framework 类型的内部映射。Expands upon the to provide additional functionality for typed datasets and generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations, including literal XSD message parts in a WSDL document.
